argumentText:
ARGUMENT
g s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dpjfval.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 2 |  | dpjfval.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 3 |  | dpjfval.p | |- P = ( G dProj S ) |
| 4 |  | dpjfval.q | |- Q = ( proj1 ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-dpj | |- dProj = ( g e. Grp , s e. ( dom DProd " { g } ) |-> ( i e. dom s |-> ( ( s ` i ) ( proj1 ` g ) ( g DProd ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> dProj = ( g e. Grp , s e. ( dom DProd " { g } ) |-> ( i e. dom s |-> ( ( s ` i ) ( proj1 ` g ) ( g DProd ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> s = S ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> dom s = dom S ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> dom S = I ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> dom s = I ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> g = G ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( proj1 ` g ) = ( proj1 ` G ) ) |
| 13 | 12, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( proj1 ` g ) = Q ) |
| 14 | 7 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( s ` i ) = ( S ` i ) ) |
| 15 | 10 | #P_difeq1d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( dom s \ { i } ) = ( I \ { i } ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_reseq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) = ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( g DProd ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) ) = ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 14, 17 | #P_oveq123d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( ( s ` i ) ( proj1 ` g ) ( g DProd ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) ) ) = ( ( S ` i ) Q ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 10, 18 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( ( ph /\ ( g = G /\ s = S ) ) -> ( i e. dom s |-> ( ( s ` i ) ( proj1 ` g ) ( g DProd ( s |` ( dom s \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) = ( i e. I |-> ( ( S ` i ) Q ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ g = G ) -> g = G ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_sneqd | |- ( ( ph /\ g = G ) -> { g } = { G } ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ g = G ) -> ( dom DProd " { g } ) = ( dom DProd " { G } ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_dprdgrp | |- ( G dom DProd S -> G e. Grp ) |
| 24 | 1, 23 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 25 |  | #P_reldmdprd | |- Rel dom DProd |
| 26 |  | #P_elrelimasn | |- ( Rel dom DProd -> ( S e. ( dom DProd " { G } ) <-> G dom DProd S ) ) |
| 27 | 25, 26 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( S e. ( dom DProd " { G } ) <-> G dom DProd S ) |
| 28 | 1, 27 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> S e. ( dom DProd " { G } ) ) |
| 29 | 1, 2 | #P_dprddomcld | |- ( ph -> I e. _V ) |
| 30 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( I e. _V -> ( i e. I |-> ( ( S ` i ) Q ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) e. _V ) |
